title: _SET_OPPRESSOR_TRANSFORM_STATE
content:
0x544996C0081ABDEB// SetOppressorTransformState
void _SET_OPPRESSOR_TRANSFORM_STATE(Vehicle vehicle, BOOL extend);Parameters:vehicle: The vehicle (tested with oppressor only)extend: Set to true to extend the wings, false to retract them.Set state to true to extend the wings, false to retract them.
codeBlocks:
local vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsIn(PlayerPedId(), false)
-- Example usage for _SET_OPPRESSOR_TRANSFORM_STATE
_etOppressorTransformState(vehicle, true)
